Note: For a prose version see Cambridge, Corpus Christi College 101, f. 25.
_description: Four victims of tyranny — two couplets

Lam120.Transcription:
Foure leden an il lyfhuntys hors an knauis wyefCherl ys cherl
                    and child is brydMichil soruyn ys hem bityd
Lam120.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  Claude Jenkins.  
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Lambeth
                Palace.
         2 vols. Cambridge, 1930-32: 199.
